title: PCB postpones domestic events - Sport - DAWN.COM
content:
LAHORE: The Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) on Saturday confirmed that the ongoing Presidentâ€™s Trophy Grade-II, Regional Intra-District Challenge Cup and the Inter-District U-19 One-day tournament have been postponed with immediate effect due to the prevailing security condition in the country.

The said tournaments will resume from the same stage later and a revised schedule will be shared closer to the resumption, said the PCB in a statement on its website.

Published in Dawn, May 11th, 2025
